A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Still need to see it a second time. But my first take on it was… Garbage. A complete insult to those that are a true Star Wars origin Fan. The only reason this film gets two stars is because they brought back Yoda in puppet form. But overall they should’ve never brought back Yoda. The Finn and Rose storyline was completely pointless. The humor in most scenes was out of place. The directors attempt on his new take was just simply dissed tasteful. Leaving me with emotions of “was I supposed to like that?”
